label: ham
subject: Re: [R] Read Windows-like .INI files into R data structure?
body: 99 (return) [ Observe with how much indifference C¾sar relates, in the Commentaries of the Gallic war, _that_ he put to death the whole senate of the Veneti, who had yielded to his mercy, (iii. 16;) _that_ he labored to extirpate the whole nation of the Eburones, (vi. 31;) _that_ forty thousand persons were massacred at Bourges by the just revenge of his soldiers, who spared neither age nor sex, (vii. 27,) &c.]
